tool_description: this api provides today's football matches results
name: Football results of today
title: Football results of today

api_list.name: Main endpoint
api_list.description: Get today's results of football matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-results-of-today.p.rapidapi.com/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-results-of-today.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-results-of-today.p.rapidapi.com/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-results-of-today.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
